attributes.action: Why are we the dumping ground for other countries ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why does this once great country of ours take every other countries unwanted/criminal/liars/cheats/thiefs/
scroungers etc,etc...
We can't even afford to look after our own people OAP's/Nurses/Hospitals/Education etc etc...

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
